pullRequest.body:
Add the following lemmas about finite product of measures and measurable equivalences:

- `piCongrLeft_apply_apply`
- `pi_map_piCongrLeft`
- `pi_map_piOptionEquivProd`


---

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9491848033/job/26158016807)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9491848033/job/26158016683)

```suggestion
    piCongrLeft (fun i' ↦ β i') e x (e i) = x i := by
```

There are several goals after that `constructor`, right?
```suggestion
    constructor
    · tauto
    · intro h i
      rcases i <;> tauto
```

```suggestion
  let e_meas : ((i : ι) → β (some i)) × β none ≃ᵐ ((i : Option ι) → β i) :=
    MeasurableEquiv.piOptionEquivProd β |>.symm
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Add lemmas about finite products of measures
